<h3 id="X31757">X(31757) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: 3rd EULER AND ORTHIC</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*((b^2+c^2)*a^3+(b+c)*(b^2+c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)^2*a-(b+c)*(b^4-b^2*c^2+c^4))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31757) = X(1)+3*X(3060) = X(8)-9*X(11002) = X(10)-3*X(51) = X(40)-5*X(3567) = X(72)-3*X(15049) = 3*X(165)-7*X(15043) = 3*X(354)-X(23156) = 3*X(375)-2*X(4015) = 3*X(568)+X(12699) = 3*X(568)-X(31728) = 5*X(1698)-9*X(5640) = 3*X(1699)+X(5889) = 3*X(2979)-7*X(3624) = X(3579)-3*X(5946) = 7*X(3622)+9*X(16981) = 2*X(3634)-3*X(5943) = 3*X(3817)-X(5562) = 3*X(3819)-4*X(19878) = X(3901)+3*X(30438) = 3*X(3917)-5*X(19862)</b>
<p>
For these triangles the orthopoles are concident.</p>
<p>X(31757) lies on these lines:
{1,3060}, {2,31737}, {4,31732}, {5,31752}, {8,11002}, {10,51}, {22,16472}, {40,3567}, {52,946}, {54,9625}, {72,15049}, {143,517}, {165,15043}, {354,23156}, {375,4015}, {386,23414}, {389,516}, {511,1125}, {515,5446}, {519,21849}, {551,21969}, {568,12699}, {674,3678}, {730,27375}, {942,2392}, {1112,1829}, {1154,9955}, {1351,11365}, {1385,10263}, {1469,30148}, {1698,5640}, {1699,5889}, {1902,6746}, {2390,4757}, {2807,16625}, {2979,3624}, {3056,30142}, {3244,16980}, {3271,10974}, {3293,20962}, {3579,5946}, {3622,16981}, {3626,23841}, {3634,5943}, {3817,5562}, {3819,19878}, {3881,8679}, {3901,30438}, {3917,19862}, {4347,19366}, {5012,9591}, {5044,9047}, {5045,9037}, {5248,5752}, {5462,6684}, {5482,6681}, {5587,9781}, {5847,9969}, {5886,6243}, {5901,14449}, {5907,12571}, {6101,11230}, {6102,22793}, {6688,31253}, {7988,11444}, {8193,9777}, {8227,11412}, {9587,11422}, {9622,26882}, {9729,12512}, {9730,31730}, {9911,11432}, {9956,10095}, {10110,19925}, {10165,10625}, {10171,11793}, {11231,15026}, {12006,31663}, {12702,13321}, {13391,13624}, {13417,13605}, {13451,18357}, {13598,28164}, {13630,28146}, {13754,18483}, {15024,31423}, {15178,16982}, {16881,28174}, {18180,25639}, {25306,30172}</p>
<p>
X(31757) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {4, 31732}, {52, 946}, {551, 21969}, {1385, 10263}, {3244, 16980}, {5901, 14449}, {6102, 22793}, {6243, 31738}, {12699, 31728}, {13417, 13605}<br>
X(31757) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3626, 23841), (5907, 12571), (6684, 5462), (9956, 10095), (12512, 9729), (19925, 10110), (23157, 5045), (31663, 12006), (31751, 9955), (31752, 5), (31760, 143)<br>
X(31757) = complement of X(31737)<br>
X(31757) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (568, 12699, 31728), (5886, 6243, 31738)<br>
</p>
